TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit NetworkStream extends System.IO.Stream

summary.span: 提供基礎資料流以進行網路存取。

span.span: Provides the underlying stream of data for network access.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會提供方法來傳送和接收資料透過封鎖模式通訊端。The class provides methods for sending and receiving data over sockets in blocking mode. 如需有關封鎖與封鎖s，請參閱[使用非同步用戶端通訊端](~/docs/framework/network-programming/using-an-asynchronous-client-socket.md)。For more information about blocking versus nonblocking s, see [Using an Asynchronous Client Socket](~/docs/framework/network-programming/using-an-asynchronous-client-socket.md). 您可以使用這兩個同步和非同步資料傳輸的類別。You can use the class for both synchronous and asynchronous data transfer. 如需有關同步和非同步通訊的詳細資訊，請參閱[通訊端](~/docs/framework/network-programming/sockets.md)。For more information about synchronous and asynchronous communication, see [Sockets](~/docs/framework/network-programming/sockets.md). 若要建立，您必須提供連接。To create a , you must provide a connected . 您也可以指定哪些權限高於提供。You can also specify what permission the has over the provided . 根據預設，關閉不會關閉提供。By default, closing the does not close the provided . 如果您想擁有關閉所提供的權限，您必須指定`true`值的`ownsSocket`參數。If you want the to have permission to close the provided , you must specify `true` for the value of the `ownsSocket` parameter. 使用和方法來簡單的單一執行緒同步鎖定的 I/O。Use the and methods for simple single thread synchronous blocking I/O. 如果您想要處理您使用個別執行緒的 I/O，請考慮使用和方法，或和通訊的方法。If you want to process your I/O using separate threads, consider using the and methods, or the and methods for communication. 不支援隨機存取的網路資料流。The does not support random access to the network data stream. 值屬性，指出資料流是否支援搜尋，永遠是`false`; 讀取屬性，讀取屬性或呼叫方法會擲回.The value of the property, which indicates whether the stream supports seeking, is always `false`; reading the property, reading the property, or calling the method will throw a . 讀取和寫入作業可以同時執行的執行個體上類別，而不需要同步處理。Read and write operations can be performed simultaneously on an instance of the class without the need for synchronization. 只要沒有 「 寫入 」 操作專用的執行緒和一個唯一的執行緒，用於讀取作業，讀取之間會有互相干擾，並寫入執行緒無同步處理不需要。As long as there is one unique thread for the write operations and one unique thread for the read operations, there will be no cross-interference between read and write threads and no synchronization is required. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立從已連線並執行基本的同步封鎖 I/O。The following code example demonstrates how to create a from a connected and perform basic synchronous blocking I/O. [!code-cpp[NetworkStream_Synch_SendAndReceive#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NetworkStream_Synch_SendAndReceive/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[NetworkStream_Synch_SendAndReceive#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NetworkStream_Synch_SendAndReceive/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[NetworkStream_Synch_SendAndReceive#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NetworkStream_Synch_SendAndReceive/VB/source.vb#2)]

param.name: buffer

span.span: An array of type that is the location in memory to store data read from the .

param.span: buffe 中的位置，開始將資料儲存至其中。

span.span: The location in buffer to begin storing the data.

param.name: size
param.span: 要從 讀取的位元組數。

span.span: The number of bytes to read from the .

param.span: 委派，會在 完成時加以執行。

summary.span: 開始從 進行非同步讀取。

span.span: Begins an asynchronous read from the .
An that represents the asynchronous call.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可讓您開始以非同步方式從傳入的網路緩衝區中讀取資料。The method starts asynchronously reading data from the incoming network buffers. 呼叫方法可讓您接收不同的執行緒中的資料。Calling the method gives you the ability to receive data within a separate execution thread. 您必須建立實作的回呼方法委派，並將其名稱傳遞方法。You must create a callback method that implements the delegate and pass its name to the method. 在最起碼您`state`參數必須包含。At the very minimum, your `state` parameter must contain the . 因為您會想要取得已接收的資料，您的回呼方法中，您應該建立的小型類別或結構來保留讀取的緩衝區和其他有用的資訊。Because you will want to obtain the received data within your callback method, you should create a small class or structure to hold a read buffer and any other useful information. 若要將結構或類別執行個體傳遞方法，透過`state`參數。Pass the structure or class instance to the method through the `state` parameter. 回呼方法應該呼叫方法。Your callback method should call the method. 當您的應用程式呼叫，系統會等到收到資料或發生錯誤，然後系統會使用另一個執行緒來執行指定的回呼方法和上的區塊直到提供讀取資料或擲回例外狀況。When your application calls , the system will wait until data is received or an error occurs, and then the system will use a separate thread to execute the specified callback method, and blocks on until the provided reads data or throws an exception. 如果您想要封鎖您呼叫之後，原始執行緒方法，請使用方法。If you want the original thread to block after you call the method, use the method. 呼叫在回呼方法，當您想要繼續執行原始的執行緒時。Call in the callback method when you want the original thread to continue executing. 如需有關撰寫回呼方法的詳細資訊，請參閱[封送處理做為回呼方法的委派](~/docs/framework/interop/marshaling-a-delegate-as-a-callback-method.md)。For additional information about writing callback methods, see [Marshaling a Delegate as a Callback Method](~/docs/framework/interop/marshaling-a-delegate-as-a-callback-method.md). 方法會讀取可供使用，最多為指定的位元組數目的資料量`size`參數。The method reads as much data as is available, up to the number of bytes specified by the `size` parameter. > [!NOTE] > 如果您收到，檢查屬性來判斷如果它因。If you receive an , check the property to determine if it was caused by a . 如果是，使用屬性來取得特定的錯誤碼，並請參閱 Windows Sockets 第 2 版 API 錯誤的程式碼文件 MSDN 中錯誤的詳細描述。If so, use the property to obtain the specific error code, and refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in MSDN for a detailed description of the error. 讀取和寫入作業可以同時執行的執行個體上類別，而不需要同步處理。Read and write operations can be performed simultaneously on an instance of the class without the need for synchronization. 只要沒有 「 寫入 」 操作專用的執行緒和一個唯一的執行緒，用於讀取作業，讀取之間會有互相干擾，並寫入執行緒無同步處理不需要。As long as there is one unique thread for the write operations and one unique thread for the read operations, there will be no cross-interference between read and write threads and no synchronization is required. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用從網路資料流非同步讀取資料。The following code example uses to read data asynchronously from the network stream. `myReadCallBack`方法實作委派，而且由系統呼叫時傳回。The `myReadCallBack` method implements the delegate and is called by the system when returns. [!code-cpp[NetworkStream_Async_SendAndReceive#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NetworkStream_Async_SendAndReceive/CPP/source.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[NetworkStream_Async_SendAndReceive#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NetworkStream_Async_SendAndReceive/CS/source.cs#3)] [!code-vb[NetworkStream_Async_SendAndReceive#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NetworkStream_Async_SendAndReceive/VB/source.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會啟動非同步傳送作業，以遠端主機。The method starts an asynchronous send operation to the remote host. 呼叫方法可讓您傳送不同的執行緒中的資料。Calling the method gives you the ability to send data within a separate execution thread. 您必須建立實作的回呼方法委派，並將其名稱傳遞方法。You must create a callback method that implements the delegate and pass its name to the method. 在最起碼您`state`參數必須包含。At the very minimum, your `state` parameter must contain the . 如果您的回呼需要詳細資訊，您可以建立小型類別或結構來保留以及其他必要的資訊。If your callback needs more information, you can create a small class or structure to hold the and the other required information. 若要將結構或類別執行個體傳遞方法，透過`state`參數。Pass the structure or class instance to the method through the `state` parameter. 回呼方法應該實作方法。Your callback method should implement the method. 當您的應用程式呼叫，系統會使用個別的執行緒來執行指定的回呼方法，並封鎖直到傳送要求的位元組數目，或擲回例外狀況。When your application calls , the system uses a separate thread to execute the specified callback method, and blocks on until the sends the number of bytes requested or throws an exception. 如果您想要封鎖您呼叫之後，原始執行緒方法，請使用方法。If you want the original thread to block after you call the method, use the method. 呼叫在回呼方法，當您想要繼續執行原始的執行緒時。Call in the callback method when you want the original thread to continue executing. 如需有關撰寫回呼方法的詳細資訊，請參閱[封送處理做為回呼方法的委派](~/docs/framework/interop/marshaling-a-delegate-as-a-callback-method.md)。For additional information about writing callback methods, see [Marshaling a Delegate as a Callback Method](~/docs/framework/interop/marshaling-a-delegate-as-a-callback-method.md). > [!NOTE] > 如果您收到，檢查屬性來判斷如果它因。If you receive an , check the property to determine if it was caused by a . 如果是，使用屬性來取得特定的錯誤碼，並請參閱 Windows Sockets 第 2 版 API 錯誤的程式碼文件 MSDN 中錯誤的詳細描述。If so, use the property to obtain the specific error code, and refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in MSDN for a detailed description of the error. 讀取和寫入作業可以同時執行的執行個體上類別，而不需要同步處理。Read and write operations can be performed simultaneously on an instance of the class without the need for synchronization. 只要沒有 「 寫入 」 操作專用的執行緒和一個唯一的執行緒，用於讀取作業，讀取之間會有互相干擾，並寫入執行緒無同步處理不需要。As long as there is one unique thread for the write operations and one unique thread for the read operations, there will be no cross-interference between read and write threads and no synchronization is required. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用將以非同步方式將資料寫入至的網路資料流。The following code example uses to write data asynchronously to a network stream. `myWriteCallBack`方法實作委派，而且由系統呼叫時傳回。The `myWriteCallBack` method implements the delegate and is called by the system when returns. [!code-cpp[NetworkStream_Async_SendAndReceive#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NetworkStream_Async_SendAndReceive/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[NetworkStream_Async_SendAndReceive#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NetworkStream_Async_SendAndReceive/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[NetworkStream_Async_SendAndReceive#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NetworkStream_Async_SendAndReceive/VB/source.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void Dispose (bool disposing);

param.name: disposing
param.span: 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源， 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 釋放 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the method. `Dispose` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設定為`true`。`Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 叫用`Dispose`與`disposing`設`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. `disposing` 參數為 `true` 時，這個方法會釋放 參考的任何 Managed 物件所掌握的資源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 覆寫 時，請小心不要參考到先前已在對 的早期呼叫中被處置 (Dispose) 的物件。

span.span: When overriding , be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 如需有關如何實作，請參閱[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 如需有關和，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[覆寫 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

Public Overrides Function EndRead (asyncResult As IAsyncResult) As Integer
public: override int EndRead(IAsyncResult ^ asyncResult);

param.name: asyncResult
param.span: ，表示非同步呼叫。

span.span: An that represents an asynchronous call.

summary.span: 處理非同步讀取的結束。

span.span: Handles the end of an asynchronous read.

returns.span: 從 讀取的位元組數。

span.span: The number of bytes read from the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法完成非同步的讀取的作業，以啟動方法。The method completes the asynchronous read operation started in the method. 然後再呼叫，您需要建立回呼方法，實作委派。Before calling , you need to create a callback method that implements the delegate. 不同的執行緒中執行這個回呼方法，以及之後系統便會呼叫傳回。This callback method executes in a separate thread and is called by the system after returns. 回呼方法必須接受從傳回做為參數的方法。The callback method must accept the returned from the method as a parameter. 在回呼方法中呼叫屬性取得狀態物件傳遞至方法。Within the callback method, call the property of the to obtain the state object passed to the method. 擷取接收從這個狀態物件。Extract the receiving from this state object. 取得之後，呼叫方法已成功完成讀取的作業，並傳回讀取的位元組數目。After obtaining the , call the method to successfully complete the read operation and return the number of bytes read. 方法會封鎖，直到資料為止。The method blocks until data is available. 方法會讀取位於最高達指定的位元組數目的資料量`size`參數方法。The method reads as much data as is available up to the number of bytes specified in the `size` parameter of the method. 如果遠端主機關機已收到連線及所有可用的資料，方法立即完成，並傳回零個位元組。If the remote host shuts down the connection and all available data has been received, the method completes immediately and returns zero bytes. 若要取得已接收的資料，請呼叫屬性，然後將解壓縮所產生的狀態物件中包含的緩衝區。To obtain the received data, call the property of the , and extract the buffer contained in the resulting state object. > [!NOTE] > 如果您收到，檢查屬性來判斷如果它因。If you receive an , check the property to determine if it was caused by a . 如果是，使用屬性來取得特定的錯誤碼，並請參閱 Windows Sockets 第 2 版 API 錯誤的程式碼文件 MSDN 中錯誤的詳細描述。If so, use the property to obtain the specific error code, and refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in MSDN for a detailed description of the error. ## Examples 在下列程式碼範例中，`myReadCallback`提供給做為回呼方法。In the following code example, `myReadCallback` is provided to as the callback method. 中實作`myReadCallback`完成非同步讀取呼叫來啟動。 is implemented in `myReadCallback` to complete the asynchronous read call started by . [!code-cpp[NetworkStream_Async_SendAndReceive#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NetworkStream_Async_SendAndReceive/CPP/source.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[NetworkStream_Async_SendAndReceive#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NetworkStream_Async_SendAndReceive/CS/source.cs#5)] [!code-vb[NetworkStream_Async_SendAndReceive#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NetworkStream_Async_SendAndReceive/VB/source.vb#5)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 完成非同步傳送作業啟動。 completes the asynchronous send operation started in . 然後再呼叫，您需要建立回呼方法，實作委派。Before calling , you need to create a callback method that implements the delegate. 不同的執行緒中執行這個回呼方法，以及之後系統便會呼叫傳回。This callback method executes in a separate thread and is called by the system after returns. 回呼方法必須接受從傳回做為參數的方法。The callback method must accept the returned from the method as a parameter. 在回呼方法中呼叫屬性`IAsyncResult`參數來取得。Within the callback method, call the property of the `IAsyncResult` parameter to obtain the . 取得之後，您可以呼叫方法已成功完成傳送作業並傳回傳送的位元組數目。After obtaining the , you can call the method to successfully complete the send operation and return the number of bytes sent. 方法會封鎖，直到傳送要求的位元組數目。The method blocks until the requested number of bytes are sent. > [!NOTE] > 如果您收到，檢查屬性來判斷如果它因。If you receive an , check the property to determine if it was caused by a . 如果是，使用屬性來取得特定的錯誤碼，並請參閱 Windows Sockets 第 2 版 API 錯誤的程式碼文件 MSDN 中錯誤的詳細描述。If so, use the property to obtain the specific error code, and refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in MSDN for a detailed description of the error. ## Examples 在下列程式碼範例中，`myWriteCallback`提供給做為回呼方法。In the following code example, `myWriteCallback` is provided to as the callback method. 中實作`myWriteCallback`來完成非同步寫入呼叫來啟動。 is implemented in `myWriteCallback` to complete the asynchronous write call started by . summary.span: 釋放 所使用的所有資源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法覆寫 。This method overrides . 應用程式程式碼不應該呼叫這個方法。物件的方法會自動叫用記憶體回收期間，除非已停用記憶體回收行程的最終處理的呼叫所方法。Application code should not call this method; an object's method is automatically invoked during garbage collection, unless finalization by the garbage collector has been disabled by a call to the method. 如需使用 Finalize 方法的詳細資訊，請參閱[Finalize 方法和解構函式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70)，[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)，和[覆寫 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).For more information about using the Finalize method, see [Finalize Methods and Destructors](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70), [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md), and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果這個屬性所指定的時間內讀取的作業未完成，讀取的作業會擲回。If the read operation does not complete within the time specified by this property, the read operation throws an . > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性會影響只同步呼叫來執行的讀取方法。This property affects only synchronous reads performed by calling the method. 這個屬性不會影響執行呼叫的非同步讀取方法。This property does not affect asynchronous reads performed by calling the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會設定為 10 毫秒的網路資料流的讀取逾時。The following code example sets the read time-out for a network stream to 10 milliseconds. param.name: buffer
param.span: 型別的陣列，包含要寫入至 的資料。

span.span: An array of type that contains the data to write to the .

param.name: offset
param.span: buffe 中的位置，要開始自該處寫入資料。

span.span: The location in buffer from which to start writing data.

param.name: size
param.span: 要寫入至 的位元組數。

span.span: The number of bytes to write to the .

summary.span: 寫入資料至 。

span.span: Writes data to the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會啟動在指定`offset`並傳送`size`位元組的內容從`buffer`到網路。The method starts at the specified `offset` and sends `size` bytes from the contents of `buffer` to the network. 方法會封鎖，直到傳送要求的位元組數目或就會擲回。The method blocks until the requested number of bytes is sent or a is thrown. 如果您收到，使用屬性來取得特定的錯誤碼，並請參閱 Windows Sockets 第 2 版 API 錯誤的程式碼文件 MSDN 中錯誤的詳細描述。If you receive a , use the property to obtain the specific error code, and refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in MSDN for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 請查看是可寫入存取屬性。Check to see if the is writable by accessing the property. 如果您嘗試寫入不是可寫入，您會收到。If you attempt to write to a that is not writable, you will get an . 如果您收到，檢查屬性來判斷如果它因。If you receive an , check the property to determine if it was caused by a . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會檢查以查看是否是可寫入。The following code example checks to see whether the is writable. 如果是，然後用來寫入的小型訊息。If it is, then is used to write a small message.
